name: Fire Elemental Myrmidon
languages: one language of its creator's choice

abilities.name: Illumination.
abilities.description: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in a 40-foot radius.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

abilities.name: Water Susceptibility.
abilities.description: For every 5 feet the myrmidon moves in water, it takes 2 (1d4) cold damage.
